QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Poison control center - emergency number
QAPair.Answer: For a POISON EMERGENCY call: 1-800-222-1222 ANYWHERE IN THE UNITED STATES This national hotline number will let you talk to experts in poisoning. This is a free and confidential service. All local poison control centers in the United States use this national number. You should call if you have any questions about poisoning or poison prevention. You can call 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. For more information, contact the American Association of Poison Control Centers -- www.aapcc.org .
